metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0639 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Authorization Bypass Through User-Controlled Key in NPM url-parse prior to 1.5.7.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-0639` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-url-parse - 1.5.10+~1.4.8-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-url-parse package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.10+~1.4.8-2').
